text:
@realDonaldTrump @WhiteHouse YOU ARE THE DUMBEST MAN ALIVE 

Your staff in the WH are just as bad 

Why didn’t you protect our WWII heroes from COVID19 after you’ve been exposed? 

Koolaide Kayleigh said “They’re the ones who chose to come here.” 

WH staff=Trump robots no mind/feelings
